headline: 3 Reasons to Avoid CHD and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Church & Dwight currently trades at $98.04 per share and has shown little upside over the past six months, posting a small loss of 3.3%. The stock also fell short of the S&P 500’s 6.9% gain during that period.
